issue.title: [C++] Fix crashes on corrupt IPC input
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7592](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7592). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix the following issues spotted by OSS-Fuzz:
https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=20117
https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=20124
https://bugs.chromium.org/p/oss-fuzz/issues/detail?id=20127

Those are basic missing sanity checks when reading an IPC file.
